issue.title: [Flight][Java] DoAction does not support result streams
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5254](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5254). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While Flight defines DoAction as returning a stream of results, the Java APIs only allow returning a single result.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5254?focusedCommentId=16846153) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4250
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4250>
